tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
quoteText: You agree that Fivestars, in its sole discretion, may suspend or terminate your account (or any part thereof) or use of the Service for any reason, including, without limitation, for lack of use or if Fivestars believes that you have violated or acted inconsistently with the letter or spirit of these Terms.
